Text: Yes.  Atlantic Fox uses cookies and other similar tracking technologies (“Tracking Technologies”) in connection with operating our website and providing the Services.  These Tracking Technologies are used to collect information about the devices being used to access our website and Services, to determine our Users’ interest in specific areas of our website and Services, to customize the presentation of our website and Services and other similar internal business purposes.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: When a User visits our website, uses our Services, or engages with us through other online and offline methods, we may collect that User’s name, email, postal address, phone number, payment card information, and other information that User chooses to provide so that we may contact that User, respond to that User’s requests or perform the Services the User has requested. \n\nWe also collect some information automatically when a User visits our website or uses our Services, including information about the specific device being used, including the device’s identifier (e.g., MAC address), IP address, operating system, and other similar information.  We also collect information about use of our website and Services, including information about the pages visited, the time spent on our website or using the Services, the Services used, and other similar information.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
We use Personal Information to operate our business.  Examples of the ways we use User Personal Information include:

to respond to requests, comments, and questions
to provide the Services
to understand User preferences and enhance and personalize Users’ experience
to maintain User accounts
to respond to and prevent fraud and other information security risks
to maintain and improve the Services
to conduct research and development
to market existing and new Services
to provide information about our Services
to maintain legal and regulatory compliance
as part of the sale of all or substantially all of our business
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Does Atlantic Fox Sell Personal Information about Users?\nNo.  We do not sell personal information about Users.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Yes.  Atlantic Fox collects User Personal Information for its own business purposes only.  Atlantic Fox only provides User Personal Information to Atlantic Fox service providers and vendors who have entered into a nondisclosure agreement or other agreement that protects the confidentiality of information provided and prohibits them from using User Personal Information except to provide services to Atlantic Fox and its Clients.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Atlantic Fox provides data from third party vendors to its Clients for use as part of the Services.  From time-to-time, Atlantic Fox may be required to disclose information about Users to these vendors for purposes relating to provision of the Services, including licensing, audits, and other similar activities.\n\nIn the past twelve (12) months, Atlantic Fox has shared the following categories of Personal Information with its Service Providers or Vendors in all the categories that it collects information, including identifiers, personal information listed in the California records statute, commercial information, Internet or other network information, and geolocation data (described more fully above).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Right to Know and Access to Specific Personal Information.  You have the right to request that we disclose to you information about our collection, use and disclosure of your Personal Information over the past twelve (12) months.  In response to your verifiable request, we will disclose:

The categories of Personal Information we have collected about you
The categories of sources of Personal Information we have collected about you
Our business or commercial purpose for collecting and sharing your Personal Information
The categories of third parties with whom we share that Personal Information
The specific pieces of Personal Information we have collected about you
If shared for a business purpose, the specific disclosures made for a business purpose made to a third party identifying the categories of information disclosed about you.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text:
Right to Know and Access to Specific Personal Information.  You have the right to request that we disclose to you information about our collection, use and disclosure of your Personal Information over the past twelve (12) months.  In response to your verifiable request, we will disclose:

The categories of Personal Information we have collected about you
The categories of sources of Personal Information we have collected about you
Our business or commercial purpose for collecting and sharing your Personal Information
The categories of third parties with whom we share that Personal Information
The specific pieces of Personal Information we have collected about you
If shared for a business purpose, the specific disclosures made for a business purpose made to a third party identifying the categories of information disclosed about you.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI sold / shared

Text:
Right to Request Deletion.  You have the right to request that we delete your Personal Information subject to certain exceptions.  We may deny your request if retention of your information is necessary for any of the following reasons:

To complete a transaction which you have requested, provide a service you have requested, or take other actions reasonably necessary in the context of our ongoing business relationship with you or pursuant to contract
To detect security incidents and protect against malicious, deceptive, fraudulent or illegal activity
To correct errors or improve our Services;
To comply with applicable law or legal obligation; or
To perform internal activities that are reasonably related to the purposes for which the information was collected.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text:
Exercising Your Rights.  To exercise your data privacy rights, you may submit a request to us using one of the following options:

Please click on the following link so we can process your request
By mail at Atlantic Fox Technologies, Inc., 1 Hewitt Square, Suite 108, East Northport, New York 11731
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Non-Discrimination.  We will not discriminate against you for exercising your data privacy rights.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: Will this Privacy Notice Change?\nWe may change this Notice from time to time. If we make any changes to this Notice, we will change the Last Updated date above. If such changes are material in nature, we will provide you with additional notice (such as adding a statement to the main website page or sending you an email notification).
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: A cookie is a small piece of data that a website – when visited by a user – asks your browser to store on your device in order to remember information about you, such as your language preference or login information. Those cookies are set by us and called first party cookies.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
These cookies ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website, anonymously.
Cookie	Duration	Description
cookielawinfo-checkbox-analytics	11 months	This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Analytics".
cookielawinfo-checkbox-functional	11 months	The cookie is set by GDPR cookie consent to record the user consent for the cookies in the category "Functional".
cookielawinfo-checkbox-necessary	11 months	This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookies is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Necessary".
cookielawinfo-checkbox-others	11 months	This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Other.
cookielawinfo-checkbox-performance	11 months	This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Performance".
viewed_cookie_policy	11 months	The cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: This User Privacy Notice covers Personal Information that Atlantic Fox collects about individuals who visit our website, use our Services, or otherwise engage with us directly through social media, email, telephone, and other methods of communication (“Users”). \n\nThis User Privacy Notice does not cover Personal Information about individual consumers we process on behalf of our Clients within our SaaS Service offerings.  For information about how we process Personal Information within our SaaS Service offerings, plea
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Does Atlantic Fox Use Cookies or other Tracking Technologies?\nYes.  Atlantic Fox uses cookies and other similar tracking technologies (“Tracking Technologies”) in connection with operating our website and providing the Services.  These Tracking Technologies are used to collect information about the devices being used to access our website and Services, to determine our Users’ interest in specific areas of our website and Services, to customize the presentation of our website and Services and other similar internal business purposes.  We do not use Tracking Technologies to monitor User activities on other sites or for third party marketing purposes.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
What Personal Information Does Atlantic Fox Collect about Users?
When a User visits our website, uses our Services, or engages with us through other online and offline methods, we may collect that User’s name, email, postal address, phone number, payment card information, and other information that User chooses to provide so that we may contact that User, respond to that User’s requests or perform the Services the User has requested. 

We also collect some information automatically when a User visits our website or uses our Services, including information about the specific device being used, including the device’s identifier (e.g., MAC address), IP address, operating system, and other similar information.  We also collect information about use of our website and Services, including information about the pages visited, the time spent on our website or using the Services, the Services used, and other similar information.

Specific categories of information we have collected regarding Users in the last twelve (12) months include:

Category

Name, Company Name, Title, address, email address, telephone number, and other similar identifiers

Automatically from our website or Services

Interaction with our website and online Services

Automatically from our website or Services

Geolocation data

IP address

Automatically from our website or Services
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
How Does Atlantic Fox Use Information It Collects?
We use Personal Information to operate our business.  Examples of the ways we use User Personal Information include:

to respond to requests, comments, and questions
to provide the Services
to understand User preferences and enhance and personalize Users’ experience
to maintain User accounts
to respond to and prevent fraud and other information security risks
to maintain and improve the Services
to conduct research and development
to market existing and new Services
to provide information about our Services
to maintain legal and regulatory compliance
as part of the sale of all or substantially all of our business

Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text:
Atlantic Fox only provides User Personal Information to Atlantic Fox service providers and vendors who have entered into a nondisclosure agreement or other agreement that protects the confidentiality of information provided and prohibits them from using User Personal Information except to provide services to Atlantic Fox and its Clients.

Atlantic Fox uses service providers to provide some Atlantic Fox services.  Atlantic Fox service providers receive information about Atlantic Fox Users solely for the purpose of providing products, services, and support to Atlantic Fox to allow Atlantic Fox to provide the Services and operate its business.  Examples of Service Providers used by Atlantic Fox include cloud storage providers, website and application developers, marketing and advertising companies working on our behalf, and other similar entities that provide services to Atlantic Fox.

Atlantic Fox provides data from third party vendors to its Clients for use as part of the Services.  From time-to-time, Atlantic Fox may be required to disclose information about Users to these vendors for purposes relating to provision of the Services, including licensing, audits, and other similar activities.

In the past twelve (12) months, Atlantic Fox has shared the following categories of Personal Information with its Service Providers or Vendors in all the categories that it collects information, including identifiers, personal information listed in the California records statute, commercial information, Internet or other network information, and geolocation data (described more fully above).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Does Atlantic Fox Share Third Party Consumer Personal Information?
Yes.  Atlantic Fox provides Third Party Consumer Personal Information to Atlantic Fox service providers who have entered into a nondisclosure agreement or other agreement that protects the confidentiality of information provided and prohibits them from using Third Party Consumer Personal Information except to provide services to Atlantic Fox and its Clients.

Examples of Service Providers used by Atlantic Fox include cloud storage providers, website and application developers, marketing and advertising companies working on our behalf, and other similar entities that provide services to Atlantic Fox.

In the past twelve (12) months, Atlantic Fox has shared the following categories of Personal Information with its Service Providers including identifiers, personal information listed in the California records statute, legally protected characteristics, commercial information, education information, and inferences (as described more fully above).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text:
Do You Honor Privacy Rights Provided under U.S. State and Federal Law?
Yes.  It is Atlantic Fox’s policy to comply with all requirements of U.S. State and Federal law regarding the processing of Third Party Client Personal Information, including the California Consumer Privacy Act (as amended by the California Privacy Rights Act) (collectively, “CCPA”) and their implementing regulations, which Atlantic Fox voluntarily applies to all Third Party Consumer Personal Information.

Consistent with the requirements of the CCPA, Atlantic Fox recognizes Consumers’ rights to know and access specific Personal Information about them and to request deletion of specific Personal Information about them. 

Right to Know and Access to Specific Personal Information.  You have the right to request that we disclose to you information about our collection, use and disclosure of your Personal Information over the past twelve (12) months.  In response to your verifiable request, we will disclose:

The categories of Personal Information we have collected about you
The categories of sources of Personal Information we have collected about you
Our business or commercial purpose for collecting and sharing your Personal Information
The categories of third parties with whom we share that Personal Information
The specific pieces of Personal Information we have collected about you
If shared for a business purpose, the specific disclosures made for a business purpose made to a third party identifying the categories of information disclosed about you.
Right to Request Deletion.  You have the right to request that we delete your Personal Information subject to certain exceptions.  We may deny your request if retention of your information is necessary for any of the following reasons:

To complete a transaction which you have requested, provide a service you have requested, or take other actions reasonably necessary in the context of our ongoing business relationship with you or pursuant to contract
To detect security incidents and protect against malicious, deceptive, fraudulent or illegal activity
To correct errors or improve our Services;
To comply with applicable law or legal obligation; or
To perform internal activities that are reasonably related to the purposes for which the information was collected.
Additional Rights.  You may have additional rights under the law of your state of residence.  If you have any questions regarding what specific rights are available to you, may email us at privacy@atlanticfox.com.    

Exercising Your Rights.  To exercise your data privacy rights, you may submit a request to us using one of the following options:

By email at privacy@atlanticfox.com
By mail at Atlantic Fox Technologies, Inc., 1 Hewitt Square, Suite 108, East Northport, New York 11731
You may also have a third party make a request on your behalf.  However, such third party must provide a written, signed authorization from you before making the request.

Please note that we cannot respond to your request if we are unable to verify your identity or the authority of the person making the request.  Because Third Party Consumers do not have accounts with us, we may request information from your or the person making the request to verify the request.  For example, we may ask you to confirm certain elements of your Personal Information that likely would be known only to you.

Time to Respond.  We will respond to a verifiable data subject request within forty-five (45) days of receipt.  If we require additional time [up to ninety (90) days], we will inform you of the reason and extension period in writing.  We will typically respond to your request by email unless you specifically request that we use another method.  If we are unable to honor your request, we will explain the reasons why we are unable to comply.

Fees.  We do not charge a fee to process a request unless it is excessive, repetitive, or unfounded.  If we decide that a fee is required, we will notify you and provide you a fee estimate before completing your request.

Non-Discrimination.  We will not discriminate against you for exercising your data privacy rights.

Do You Honor Privacy Rights Provided under Non-U.S. Laws?
No.  Atlantic Fox is a U.S.-based entity and maintains its data on servers located in the United States.  Atlantic Fox also does not engage in any processing activity outside the United States.

Does Atlantic Fox Collect Information about Individuals Under the Age of 18?
No.  We do not knowingly collect information regarding users who are under the age of eighteen (18).  If we become aware that we are in possession of information of a user who is under the age of eighteen (18), we will delete that information promptly.

Will this Privacy Notice Change?
We may change this Notice from time to time. If we make any changes to this Notice, we will change the Last Updated date above. If such changes are material in nature, we will provide you with additional notice (such as adding a statement to the main website page or sending you an email notification).

How to Contact Atlantic Fox
If you have any questions about this Notice or other privacy-related issues, please contact us at:

Email:  privacy@atlanticfox.com

Physical:
Atlantic Fox Technologies, Inc.,
1 Hewitt Square
Suite 108
East Northport, New York 11731

Page load link
Cookie Information
A cookie is a small piece of data that a website – when visited by a user – asks your browser to store on your device in order to remember information about you, such as your language preference or login information. Those cookies are set by us and called first party cookies. We also use third party cookies – which are cookies from a domain different than the domain of the website you are visiting – for our advertising and marketing efforts.

Text: What is Personal Information?\nPersonal Information is information about a specific person or household.  This definition includes any information that identifies, relates to, describes, is reasonably capable of being associated with, or could reasonably be linked, directly or indirectly, with a specific person or household.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Does Atlantic Fox Use Cookies or other Tracking Technologies?\nYes.  Atlantic Fox uses cookies and other similar tracking technologies (“Tracking Technologies”) in connection with operating our website and providing the Services.  These Tracking Technologies are used to collect information about the devices being used to access our website and Services, to determine our Users’ interest in specific areas of our website and Services, to customize the presentation of our website and Services and other similar internal business purposes.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
What Personal Information Does Atlantic Fox Collect about Users?
When a User visits our website, uses our Services, or engages with us through other online and offline methods, we may collect that User’s name, email, postal address, phone number, payment card information, and other information that User chooses to provide so that we may contact that User, respond to that User’s requests or perform the Services the User has requested. 

We also collect some information automatically when a User visits our website or uses our Services, including information about the specific device being used, including the device’s identifier (e.g., MAC address), IP address, operating system, and other similar information.  We also collect information about use of our website and Services, including information about the pages visited, the time spent on our website or using the Services, the Services used, and other similar information.

Specific categories of information we have collected regarding Users in the last twelve (12) months include:

Text:
How Does Atlantic Fox Use Information It Collects?
We use Personal Information to operate our business.  Examples of the ways we use User Personal Information include:

to respond to requests, comments, and questions
to provide the Services
to understand User preferences and enhance and personalize Users’ experience
to maintain User accounts
to respond to and prevent fraud and other information security risks
to maintain and improve the Services
to conduct research and development
to market existing and new Services
to provide information about our Services
to maintain legal and regulatory compliance
as part of the sale of all or substantially all of our business

Text: Does Atlantic Fox Sell Personal Information about Users?\nNo.  We do not sell personal information about Users.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text:
Does Atlantic Fox Share Personal Information about Users?
Yes.  Atlantic Fox collects User Personal Information for its own business purposes only.  Atlantic Fox only provides User Personal Information to Atlantic Fox service providers and vendors who have entered into a nondisclosure agreement or other agreement that protects the confidentiality of information provided and prohibits them from using User Personal Information except to provide services to Atlantic Fox and its Clients.

Atlantic Fox uses service providers to provide some Atlantic Fox services.  Atlantic Fox service providers receive information about Atlantic Fox Users solely for the purpose of providing products, services, and support to Atlantic Fox to allow Atlantic Fox to provide the Services and operate its business.  Examples of Service Providers used by Atlantic Fox include cloud storage providers, website and application developers, marketing and advertising companies working on our behalf, and other similar entities that provide services to Atlantic Fox.

Atlantic Fox provides data from third party vendors to its Clients for use as part of the Services.  From time-to-time, Atlantic Fox may be required to disclose information about Users to these vendors for purposes relating to provision of the Services, including licensing, audits, and other similar activities.

In the past twelve (12) months, Atlantic Fox has shared the following categories of Personal Information with its Service Providers or Vendors in all the categories that it collects information, including identifiers, personal information listed in the California records statute, commercial information, Internet or other network information, and geolocation data (described more fully above).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Right to Request Deletion.  You have the right to request that we delete your Personal Information subject to certain exceptions.  We may deny your request if retention of your information is necessary for any of the following reasons:

To complete a transaction which you have requested, provide a service you have requested, or take other actions reasonably necessary in the context of our ongoing business relationship with you or pursuant to contract
To detect security incidents and protect against malicious, deceptive, fraudulent or illegal activity
To correct errors or improve our Services;
To comply with applicable law or legal obligation; or
To perform internal activities that are reasonably related to the purposes for which the information was collected.
Label: Description of Right to Delete
